bibl.title: Greek Loan-Words in Demotic.
bibl.note: Most of the Greek loan-words fit into a few well-defined groups: 1. Honorific titles of kings, emperors and gods; - 2. Derivation from Greek proper names; - 3. A series of official titles; - 4. A series of technical terms. - Pp. 21-32: List of Greek words in Demotic transcriptions [Nos 1-92]; - 32-33: Uncertain and erroneous [Nos 1-22].

bibl.title: Aspects of Demotic Lexicography. Acts of the Second International Conference for Demotic Studies. Leiden, 19-21 September 1984

bibl.seg: Clarysse Willy, Greek Loan-Words in Demotic.
S.P. Vleeming (Ed.), Aspects of Demotic Lexicography. Acts of the Second International Conference for Demotic Studies. Leiden, 19-21 September 1984 = Studia Demotica. I (Leuven, 1987) pp. 9-33.

Most of the Greek loan-words fit into a few well-defined groups: 1. Honorific titles of kings, emperors and gods; - 2. Derivation from Greek proper names; - 3. A series of official titles; - 4. A series of technical terms. - Pp. 21-32: List of Greek words in Demotic transcriptions [Nos 1-92]; - 32-33: Uncertain and erroneous [Nos 1-22].
